attributes.action: PREVENT ISLAM UK MARCHING ON WOOTTON BASSET
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is a planned march at the above venue by the group Islam uk.Alot of people have shown veiws on the matter via other groups. We now ask you to act to stop this event

rejection.details: Islam4UK has said it no longer plans to march through Wootton Bassett.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
